attributes.action: Make under 18's wear FULL protection clothing on a motorcycle/scooter
attributes.additional_details: Road rash is very painful for an adult yet adults are putting the most precious things (their children) in danger of severe road rash as well as broken bones as well as death..... If adults want to take the risk fair enough their choice they know the risks but children don't have the choice the parents or carers are making those choices for them and putting them in danger..... PROTECT THE CHILDREN
attributes.background: As a rider of a motorbike we are more at risk with accidents... As a parent I would do everything to protect my children but some people don't so to protect children from serious injury we need to make it law for them to be protected with not just a helmet but clothing boots and gloves too
